SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_SIGN_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_SIGN_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'SIG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_SIGN_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(SIGN_ID) AS NEW_SIGN_ID FROM REQ4900 A WHERE 1=1 AND SIGN_ID LIKE 'SIG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REQ4900 ( PRJ_ID , REQ_ID , SIGN_ID , PROCESS_ID , SIGN_PREV_FLOW_ID , SIGN_FLOW_ID , SIGN_USR_ID , SIGN_CD , SIGN_REJECT_CMNT , SIGN_DTM , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #newSignId#, #processId#, #preFlowId#, #signFlowId#, #signUsrId#, #signCd#, #signRejectCmnt#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
